sections.heading: record; retention.The probate record shall be permanently retained on microfilm or in its original form in accordance with the Records Management Act
sections.text: Evidence shall be retained as required by the Supreme Court.SourceG.S.1873, c. 14, ยง 32, p. 270;Laws 1895, c. 31, ยง 1, p. 156;Laws 1909, c. 41, ยง 1,
